content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today?
My air conditioner hasn't worked right for weeks. This is the third company I've tried. Let's see if you can even get someone to fix it.
I’m sorry to hear you’ve had trouble with your AC, and I appreciate you reaching out to us. May I have your name so I can get started on helping you?
Does that really matter? No one ever actually shows up on time when I give my name.

I understand. I want to make sure I have your details correct so we can properly assist you. If you’d rather not share your name, that’s okay – could I at least have your address to check if we can send a technician to your location?
Fine. 149 Maple Lane. But I swear, if I get a call saying someone is stuck in traffic again, I’m done.
Thank you. You are in our service area, and I’ll do everything I can to avoid delays. When would be the best time for us to send an HVAC technician to take a look at your air conditioner?
I work odd hours, but nobody seems to care about that either. Early morning or late evening. Not like anyone’s ever actually come when they say they will...
Thank you for letting me know about your availability. Would 7:00 am or 7:00 pm work better for you? We’ll do our best to accommodate your schedule.
I doubt you really have anyone at 7am. Just tell me what it will cost. Last time someone showed up, it was some ridiculous price ‘for diagnostics’ and all they did was look at it and leave.
I understand your frustrations. I can provide a price estimate for you. Could you briefly describe what the issue with your air conditioner is, so I can give you the most accurate estimate possible?
It blows hot air and nothing else, even when it runs for hours. I’ve already told this to two other companies, but I guess you all need to hear it over and over.

Thank you for explaining. Based on your description, our standard diagnostic visit typically costs $89, which includes a full inspection and an estimate for any repairs. If repairs are needed, we’ll provide a full quote before starting any work. Would you like to schedule a visit for 7:00 am or 7:00 pm?
So I’m paying $89 just for you to tell me you can’t fix it, like the last people? Unbelievable. How about you guarantee something for once?

I wish I could promise a solution right away, but our technician will do their very best to diagnose the problem and offer a repair plan. The diagnostic fee is waived if you approve repairs during our visit. Would you like to schedule a visit and see what we can do?
I’ve had enough of this runaround. Nevermind. I’ll see if I can fix it myself or just buy a new one. Don’t contact me again.
reason: Customer asked not to be contacted.
